channel.title: Morning Mail
channel.description: Stay updated on the latest news and events happening in the RPI community.

item.title: Virtual Off Campus Housing Fair | June 5
item.description: Date: Thursday, June 5, 2025 9:00 AM - 10:30 AM - Several Property owners will be available to answer students’ questions regarding their rental options. Join the Discord Server and the event will start in the Housing Fair Channel.
item.author: Students

item.title: Coffee & Conversation | June 5
item.description: Date: Thursday, June 5, 2025 11:00 AM - 1:00 PM - Students are invited to stop by for a cup of coffee, a little treat and an opportunity to socially connect with peers!
item.author: Students

item.title: Computer Science Colloquia - Ben Greenman: Kicking the Ladder Away: From Gradual Types to Plain Types | June 5
item.description: Date: Thursday, June 5, 2025 11:00 AM - 12:00 PM - Ben Greenman is an assistant professor in the Kahlert School of Computing at the University of Utah. He earned his Ph.D. from Northeastern University in 2020 and was a CIFellows 2020 postdoc at Brown University. His team develops methods to measure performance, prove guarantees, and understand human factors for languages and systems.
item.author: Community

item.title: TIAA Confidential Counseling (In-Person) | June 5
item.description:
Date: Thursday, June 5, 2025 8:00 AM - 4:30 PM - A TIAA Financial Consultant will be available for one-on-one consultations on a broad range of retirement topics. Attend this upcoming event to help you become better informed and more confident about Rensselaer’s retirement plan benefits. Consultations will be conducted in 60 minute increments. To schedule your individual retirement counseling, please call TIAA at 1-800-732-8353 or online at https://shared.tiaa.org/public/publictools/events…

For information about sharing your news or events, or to change your subscription settings, visit morningmail.rpi.edu.
item.author: Faculty and Staff
